Text.Page:
Haven't you cleared out that citadel yet?

I'm only kidding. I've got another mission to clear out the Catacomb of Misery and the Bloody Depths.

They're overwhelmed with {@LinkCreature:33#8#merciless}, {@LinkCreature:33#9#armored}, {@LinkCreature:33#58#relentless}, and {@LinkCreature:33#59#pitiless disc reapers}.
Thank you for your hard work. I wish I could give you more.
Are the disc reapers all dead?
